paper_abstract: We prove that the chromatic polynomial PG(q) of a finite graph G of maximal degree A is free of zeros for vertical bar q vertical bar >= C* (Delta) with [Graphics] This improves results by Sokal and Borgs. Furthermore, we present a strengthening of this condition for graphs with no triangle-free vertices.
paper_title: Regions without complex zeros for chromatic polynomials on graphs with bounded degree
